title: Alastair Campbell on the New PM
itunes:title: Alastair Campbell on the New PM
description:
Former Downing Street Communications Director Alastair Campbell says the Tory leadership race has thrown up tons of material Labour could have used against the Conservatives. He tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that Labour has not been nearly aggressive enough in highlighting the mess the government has made. He says the Tory leadership campaign has been 'incredibly dispiriting' and that Liz Truss has no sense of the scale of the issues that await her in Number 10, if she becomes the next leader. Also in the show, our reporters Philip Aldrick and Emily Ashton discuss the challenges facing the next Prime Minister.
